tool_description: Analyzes backup job failure logs and error messages to identify common failure patterns, categorize errors, and suggest potential root causes and remediation steps.

error_messages.description: Array of error messages from failed backup jobs

job_names.description: Corresponding job names for each error message

error_messages: Array length mismatch: error_messages, job_names, and failure_timestamps must have the same length.
Invalid timestamp format: All failure_timestamps must be valid ISO 8601 date-time strings.
Empty error messages: At least one error message must be non-empty for analysis.
Invalid analysis depth: Use one of [basic, standard, comprehensive] for analysis_depth.
Too many errors: Maximum 100 error messages can be analyzed in a single request.
usage: Provide arrays of error_messages, job_names, and failure_timestamps of equal length. Set analysis_depth to comprehensive for detailed pattern analysis.

primary_failure_category.description: Most common category of failures (storage, network, permissions, timeout, corruption)

failure_categories.description: All identified failure categories in order of frequency

suggested_actions.description: Recommended remediation steps based on failure patterns

analysis_summary.description: Human-readable summary of the failure pattern analysis
